title._content: Image taken from page 13 of 'Bleak House ... With illustrations by H. K. Browne'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Bleak House ... With illustrations by H. K. Browne", "Single Works. Bleak House" Author: Dickens, Charles Contributor: BROWNE, Hablot Knight. Contributor: PAILTHORPE, Frederick William. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS Dex.287.", "British Library HMNTS C.58.f.21.", "British Library HMNTS C.58.i.17.", "British Library HMNTS 12620.e.11.", "British Library HMNTS C.144.b.7." Page: 13 Place of Publishing: Bradbury & Evans Date of Publishing: 1853 Publisher: London Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000931211 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
